content.title: <TextStyle.Violet>Welcome to JustArk PvP</>
content.text:
Hello Survivor:

We appreciate you dropping in to check out our community server. This is a weekday ORP and weekend PvP server. 

We do hope you enjoy the server setup and wish for you to have loads of fun on the server.

Players will come and go as time progresses, chances are you will leave as well. Yet most do come back periodically till a stable community is formed.

An In-Game shop is availbale - please press F1 or X or Square for access.

Please be sure to join us on Discord.

"Lethal Protection" and "No Building on spawn points" are active on the all maps.

Island and Astreos are good maps for new players: 

If you wish to engage in PvP activity - Use: 
<TextStyle.Violet>/nppoff</> - turns off New Player Protection permanently.

Useful commands:

Engram issues:
<TextStyle.Violet>/giveengrams</>
<TextStyle.Violet>/mindwipe</>

Dinowipe:
<TextStyle.Violet>/dinowipe</> 
<TextStyle.Violet>/cancelwipe</>

Limited Tek on startup:
<TextStyle.Violet>/Tekdelivery</>
/Tekdelivery
/Delivertekengrams

content.title: <TextStyle.Violet>Discord Rules</>
content.text:
‚óè Please choose a sensible discord/game name and profile picture.

‚óè Bullying/Racism/Sexism/Harassment or any type of discrimination is not tolerated.

‚óè Please be respectful about peoples families members if you get too personal this will be classed as bullying/harassment and admin will intervene. 

‚óè All channels must be used appropriately including trash talk, if you have an issue with a player please call them out there.

‚óè Please refrain from posting any Pornographic, gore and explicit content or media.

‚óè Revealing peoples personal information.

‚óè Any use of alt accounts = All accounts banned.

‚óèDo not promote other discords within this community

‚óèPlease do not self promote Youtube/Twitch without permission.

‚óè Do not needlessly ping or spam @ our admin team.

‚óè No sharing of cheat software or in game exploits.

‚óè No talking about IP Pulling/DDOS if you have a concern raise a ticket.

‚óè Be respectful to the admin team if they ask you to do something.

**Failure to follow the rules may result in a mute/ban depending on the severity.**

content.title: In Game Rules
content.text: 1 - @here Please do not wipe new players, allow newcomers to build up. 2 -New players can contact server host for a 5 day Admin shield over their bases. New Players are not allowed to raid or provoke PvP during this time. A white flag at your base and the word Grace after your tribe-name also helps. -New Tribes breaking the rules related to their grace needs to be reported before action can be taken against them. A ticket is required in this instance. 3 -Healing Pads and Stryder are not to be used during a raid.(both parties) TP your Dino to have it healed.nfire2:1193401088439767061> 4 -Foundation wiping is only allowed if you wish to build in that location. The Aim is to fun-PvP as a form of entertainment. Please do not allow yourselves to become Toxic over these matters. If you intend to Foundation wipe a tribe, Please discuss this with an Admin/Host beforehand. - No ORP Abuse, hacking or exploiting bugs. Should be self-explanatory. Do not enter other tribes bases while ORP is active. Do not leave at or drop tames on other tribes bases while ORP is active. Do not put sleeping bags or C4 in other tribes bases while they are offline. Do not park tames against turret towers and walls while ORP is active. ORP abuse is exploiting the shortcomings of the ORP system and is not allowed. Do not have an attack set up when an opposing tribe comes online during weekdays. Don't use any sort of software that gives you an unfair advantage. Don't intentionally cause lag. Punishment can range from a temporary ban to a permanent ban. If your tribe is doing something legitimately that could be reasonably viewed as suspicious, you should make some attempt to record yourself in case you are reported. Suspicious enough actions can lead to a ban without video or photo proof. 5 -No meshed structures or meshing of any kind Don't intentionally put structures inside the mesh, they are subject to removal. Intentionally going into the mesh is strictly prohibited and will be punished with a permanent ban. 6 -Keep structure spam to a minimum, no excessive griefing You can have spam around your own bases and any of your active FOBs, but don't spread it out too far. Excessive or pointless spam may be removed without warning. 7 -No slurs or offensive content of any kind in tribe names, player names, tame names, or anywhere else Trying to bypass the name filter could result in an immediate permanent ban. 8 -Don't take an excessive amount of base spots, keep it down to 1 cave per group Your tribe can have up to 3 bases per map, but only one can be in a cave or rathole. Claiming multiple caves may result in all of them being admin-wiped without warning. Tribes are allowed a maximum of 3 cave across the cluster. No tribe can claim the same cave on 2 different maps. Attacking undefended farming forward posts are frowned upon, refrain from doing so. It is not sporting and it borders on trolling. 9 -You may only have turrets at your own base, or an active FOB. Spamming turrets around a base you aren't actively raiding could result in a temporary ban and deletion of turrets. You can protect teleporters with turrets as long as they aren't excessive. 10 -Don't destroy/transfer loot (off server) while you are being raided. 11 -Teaming is not allowed. Attacking an active Fob is allowed if unrelated to the defender. 12 -Don't build turrets at spawn areas or structures on obelisks. Cave bases are allowed limited mesh turrets - defense. - not for firing through the mesh into your cave. **Consult Admin**. Spamming turrets on spawn beaches will result in their deletion and a potential temporary ban. Bases built on an obelisk, with or without turrets, will be subject to a complete admin-wipe. 13 -Don't use more than 3 active soakers at a time. Only 15 filled vivarium per tribe per map please. No more than 1 Cyber Structures Forcefield per 80 foundation area. 14 -Never inside your tribe. 15 -No extreme toxicity, racism, or offensive discussions of any kind. Keep toxic discussion in ‚Å†üßÇ-salty-chat 16 -Inactive FOBs can't be left up for more than 18 hours. No Stryders to be present during a raid. If a raid could last more than a weekend, please apply for a concession https://discord.com/channels/1016686367713005629/1345072470285095004 17 - Do not use Excessive lights, floating turrets, transmitters or any device causing lag in defended areas where an assault will take place during a raid. This is seen as exploiting a game mechanic. 18 - No pop Corning ( don‚Äôt decompose all the loot in your base) or decomposing your base during a raid please and tribes across the cluster should have the same names on each server. @here :arrow2: Recovery Packages are available after a heavy raid, if required. This is at the admin's discretion of course. Should you require an application, reach out with a ticket pls. üëÄ Rules are subject to change, and administration has the final say in any situation. You are fully responsible for your tribe. Associating with hackers or exploiters can still lead to a ban. If you want to report another player or tribe, open a ticket in the ‚Å†üí•-support channel. Include evidence, such as video or screenshots that demonstrate guilt. FakinNo pop Corning ( don‚Äôt decompose all the loot in your base) or decomposing your base during a raid please and tribes across the cluster should have the same names on each server such as island 1, island 2 and on dwarf map, the name of your tribe should be the same on all of them please. False/Fake evidence can lead to a ban.

content.title: Overview
content.text:
This is a light PvP server which hopefully results in some light PvP and lots of Ark.

1 - This is for the most part a No Admin server ..so most player related interactive issues needs to be sorted between yourselves. Full PvP from Friday 18h00 UK time till Sunday 22h00 UK time. 

==>Admin team might on occasion join your tribe while performing duties, this is not meant as an offensive action.

2 - Harassment will not be tolerated, this referring to behavior going beyond sporting PvP between players or tribes.

3 - This is a pvp server, thus you will be raided and light banter will most likely occur. Please be moderate in your responses.

4 - The server is set up so tribes or individuals can recover easily from a raid.

5 - The server host is available should assistance be required, use this as a last resort if it is player related. 

6 - A kind request for attacking tribes to remove their spam/fob after a raid. 
Once your tribe has given up on the raid, please clear the area of unnecessary spam.
Also .. do not wipe/raid new tribes, allow them some time to build up.

7 - After raiding a tribe, please allow them some time to recover.
No continuous harassment once the raid is completed.

8 - Each tribe will be allowed 1 Cave Base along with 1 Land base and 1 Ocean/Floating base. Thus 3 bases per will be allowed on 1 particular map of your choice. ( exceptions at Admin's Discretion)

9 - Alpha Tribes can only retain Alpha on 1 map within the cluster. The 3 bases are allowed on the dominating map only.
Alpha tribe cannot retain the 3 bases for each map.

Limited Floating Builds are tolerated (consult an admin for advice) - Snapping to world border is not allowed.

Blocking Vital Map Zones such as player spawns, dams, dens, ascension arenas, UW zones, etc.

Base spots that require the use of a teleporter, tek punch, chair, zipline, knockout strat, peli, etc are not allowed this included bases exposed to the mesh, Once you can crawl, walk or crouch in it's fine.

When building in unraidable spots, admins have the right to clear the unraidable part ie. after the barrier

Mesh defense is allowed however turrets(leave them on medium or low) is not to shoot through the mesh and no structures that do not pertain to defense are to be found in the mesh.
 
10 - Building in ratholes requiring you to glitch into it, or use a grapple to get into is not allowed. 

Cheating(ESPing, Aimbotting, spoofing to list a few) are not allowed

Duping is a bannable offence.

Abusing any form of in game exploit/glitch not allowed.

*Applicable to reports
-When creating a report ensure you have a minimum of 3 valid clips, clips must contain the accused ingame name(s).

Applicable to inis
*If and when using an ini your are not permitted to use the "cheats" on those ini programs this can include but is not limited to
*Speed hacks
*Insta Turning
*No recoil, etc

Intentional lagging of the server this includes but is not limited to intentionally changing your tribe repeatedly, mass breeding, hatching, cloning, leaving and spamming excessive genes, trans, reppys, bubbles (20 or more) around the map.

Absolutely no ban evasion(coming back on alts, spoofers)

No out of game currency is to be traded or exchanged. This could result in a `Ban`.

Threats of doxing, ddosing - Bannable offence.

Insiding is bannable (admin discresion) however no replacements will be made please note that we deal with actual insiding. We do not deal with inner tribe disputes (like: Zorro stole my pt or i got kicked)

-Demoing a base
-Switching genes off
-Must be able to provide visual proof.

==> Please note:- This rules section is a work in progress and issues will be added or removed as we go along.

content.title: Supply Drop Guide
content.text:
White Drops - Small Starter Base

White Bonus - Cloth clothing and 1 Flak Armour

Green Drops - Kibbles/Consumables

Green Bonus - Player Consumables/Tonics

Blue Drops -  Flak Armour and Shotgun

Blue Bonus -  Weapons and Ammo

Purple Drops - Artifacts and Tributes

Purple Bonus - Late Game Saddles

Yellow Drops - Early Game saddles

Yellow Drops - Mid Game Saddles

Red Drops - 1 Tek Armour and Tek Doors

Red Bonus - 1 BP, 1 Platform saddle, 1 Scuba, 1 Tek saddle

Beaver Dam - CP, Element, Silica Pearls, Black Pearl, Mushroom, Rare flower

Broodmother Hard - Element, Trophy, Tek Armour

Magapithecus Hard - Element, Trophy, Tek Armour

Dragon Hard - Element, Trophy, Tek Armour

content.title: Lethal Protection
content.text:
ORP (Offline Raid Protection) Features
PVE Base Mode (Always On ORP to allow World PVP Only)
Raid Protection (Granted by Admin for X Hours of 100% ORP Immunity)
ORP Decay Timer (Removes ORP after active for X Days in a row)
ORP Visibility (Can temporarily show the ORP radius)
Adjust Damage Calculation (Dinos, Turrets and Structures)
Passive dino protection options and exclusion list for dinos that produce paste or oil for example
Physical ORP (Structure that can be destroyed to remove ORP protection or can be set as Immune)
Tribes can place one ORP structure per map.
ORP Placement Restrictions (Many options available to customize)
ORP Activation penalties for logging during a raid
Location specific restrictions can be created per map to disallow using an ORP

content.title: PvP Flagging
content.text:
Open World PvP Flagging - Affects only players involved
This is any PvP outside of an ORP protection area (or extended range)
PvP Flag has an independent timer
Players will receive a white Buff icon when active

Cooldown Restrictions for PvP Flag Only
Block any chat command
Block using items or structures
Block placing Structures
Block picking up structures
Block using transmitters
Block copying turret settings

content.title: Raid Flagging
content.text:
Raid Flagging - Affect whole tribe
Can set a range larger then the ORP protection range to count attacking close to a protected base
Flag and can given for any damage in this area or only if something is destroyed or killed
Raid Flag has an independent timer
Can Raid Flag tribes for soaking turrets inside the ORP range.
Can notify a tribe though a Tribe Log entry about turrets being soaked
Players will receive a red Buff icon when active

Cooldown Restrictions for Raid Flag Only
Block any chat command
Block using items or structures
Block placing Structures
Block picking up structures
Block using transmitters
Block copying turret settings
Block dumping items in mass (Popcorning)

content.title: Player Commands
content.text:
Player Chat Commands
/showorp - Show visual orp range (Disabled with mod structure)
/setorp - Sets the tribe ORP at the player location (Tribe Admins can use this and logs message to the Tribe Log) (Disabled with mod structure)
/removeorp - Removes the tribe ORP (Tribe Admins can use this and logs message to the Tribe Log) (Disabled with mod structure)
/protection - Allows players to check raid protection time remaining
/tribeid - Allow tribes to get their tribe id

Admin Chat Commands
/orp - Allow admin to show an ORP bubble when inside an ORP along with the tribe id it belongs to
